Package demolition

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    The App class mainly use to create a game play screem with setted WIDTH 480 and HEIGHT 480, FPS setted to 60.
    Bomb
    The Bomb class determine where the bomb going to explode and how does the explosion impact on other GameObject such as wall and player
    BombGuy
    The BombGuy class is the character that user can control and interact with the game, it is inherited from Player
    BrokenWall
    The BroeknWall object to indicate that BombGuy can not walk through and bomb can destry the BroekenWall
    EnemyRed
    The Red Enemy that can move in random position after collided the solid or broken wall
    EnemyYellow
    The yellow Enemy that move in a certain direction cycle after collided the solid or broken wall
    GameObject
    The gameObject class conatin the position of the each gameObject refers to the game window screens and the Pimage store for corresponding object
    GoalTile
    The GoalTile object to indicated that BombGuy can advance to next level
    Level
    The Level class store all the GameObject that interact with BombGuy.
    Levels
    The collection of all the Level, manage if it is game over, or winner winner chicken dinner
    Player
    The Player class is a abstract class for all the movable object in the game such as BombGuy, Red enemy and Yellow enemy.
    SolidWall
    The BroeknWall object to indicate that BombGuy can not walk throughl
    Tile
    The Tile object to indicate that BombGuy can walk through
    Wall
    The Wall object store all the attributes that wall needed to interacte with Player object and Bomb object
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Bomb.ExplosionDirection
    The ExplosionDirection enum has three direction that Bomb can impact on
    Direction
    The direction the Plaer is facing and the direction of the Player movement and walk cycle animation
